name: Evening Dhikr
description: Authentic evening remembrances to end the day with Allah's protection

dhikrs.title: Evening Declaration of Faith
dhikrs.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
dhikrs.transliteration: Amsayna wa amsal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah la ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer
dhikrs.translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty. All praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
dhikrs.benefits: Protection and blessings for the night

dhikrs.title: Seeking Allah's Protection at Evening
dhikrs.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
dhikrs.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna wa bika nahya wa bika namootu wa ilaykal-maseer
dhikrs.translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
dhikrs.benefits: Acknowledgment of complete dependence on Allah

dhikrs.title: Seeking Refuge from Evening Harm
dhikrs.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
dhikrs.transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimaat-illahi at-tammaati min sharri ma khalaq
dhikrs.translation: I seek refuge in Allah's perfect words from the evil of what He has created.
dhikrs.benefits: Protection from all harmful things during the night

dhikrs.title: The Three Quls - Al-Ikhlas
dhikrs.arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ * اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ * لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ * وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُواً أَحَدٌ
dhikrs.transliteration: Qul huwa Allahu ahad, Allah as-samad, lam yalid wa lam yoolad, wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan ahad
dhikrs.translation: Say: He is Allah, the One! Allah, the Eternal, Absolute; He begets not, nor is He begotten; And there is none like unto Him.
dhikrs.benefits: Equivalent to one-third of the Quran, brings immense reward

dhikrs.title: Seeking Allah's Forgiveness
dhikrs.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ الْعَظِيمَ الَّذِي لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
dhikrs.transliteration: Astaghfir-ullaha al-'azeema alladhi la ilaha illa huwal-hayyul-qayyoomu wa atoobu ilayh
dhikrs.translation: I seek forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, besides whom none has the right to be worshipped except He, the Ever Living, the Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, and I turn to Him in repentance.
